 Against whom is shooting Dragoon?
  Rudra656@... wrote: ::Dragoon::
     He walks around the outside of the arena.  He stays low and keeps out of sight behind trees.  He finally spots the fight between Epyon and Nightstrike.  He puts out one hand and fires four strong but small shots at his head.
